verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
I lift my hands
(I lift my hands)
To the coming King
(To the coming King)
To the Great I AM
(To the Great I AM)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To You I sing
(To You I sing)
For You're the One
(For You're the One)
Who reigns within my heart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I will serve no foreign gods
Nor any other treasure.
For You are my heart's desire
The Spirit without measure.
Unto Your name
I will bring my sacrifice
